trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Gilford
There were no other sightings in Gilford on or around March 10th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from work, two miles from my home I was talking on the cell phoneto my sister when I curiously look out my front windshield up in the sky and sawthis green Glowing object shoot across the sky, it moved much to fast to be anairplane and the light was not the light from an airplane, I had no otherclearing to view object, it moved as fast as a meteor but with no trail behindit.
